about.title: About Me
about.message: Hello, my name is Tran. I have completed my degree in Information Systems and am currently seeking an opportunity as a Frontend Developer. I focus on building modern, user-friendly web interfaces using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. I have experience implementing UI designs, managing application state, and integrating APIs from backend services. I have also built projects using Java Spring Boot, which helps me understand system architecture, API design, and collaborate effectively with backend teams. My goal is to grow into a skilled Frontend Developer with a strong technical foundation, product-oriented thinking, and the ability to deliver long-term value to both the team and the company.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.message: Thank you for reviewing my portfolio. I am open to Frontend Developer opportunities and would welcome the opportunity to connect.
